short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a clean output of all GTM ad request/response info. Not compatible with AMP or video ads. By Mark Bland (C) 2025

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad Tracker simplifies ad troubleshooting by providing detailed insights into ad calls and responses for sites using Google Publisher Tags. It displays key ad data such as:
-Ad sizes and units
-Key-value pairs
-Advertiser, order, line item, and creative IDs
-RTB/Header Bidding auction results

How It Works:
-Install the extension and load a website with ads in Chrome.
-Click the Ad Tracker button in the bottom-left corner of your browser.
-A popup window will display detailed ad call and response data.

Features:
-Easily view ad request details for troubleshooting or optimization.
-Popup can be resized, moved, minimized, or reopened by reloading the page.
-Designed for ad ops professionals, including publishers, advertisers, and agencies.

Quickly access and analyze ad information directly in your browser on page load.
